user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update db_user set user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_pwd = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_status = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creater_user_id = #{createrUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_time = #{createrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier_user_id = #{modifierUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier_time = #{modifierTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, u.user_account as userAccount, u.user_status as userStatus, u.user_type as userType, u.creater_time as createrTime from db_user u
LIMIT #{start},#{limit}

sql.where:
u.user_status <> '0' and u.user_account <> 'admin'
and (u.user_account LIKE CONCAT(#{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR u.user_name LIKE CONCAT(#{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )
